    Methods in types with parameters of type Filling
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    Bottle.receive(Filling s)
    In case there is space puts a Filling object on the first free position of the Bottle
    boolean
    Cup.receive(Filling s)
    Differently from the method receive from the super class Bottle, this receive method can only be used up to 3 times so it will fill the cup with the given content and increment the number of current usages until it reaches the maximum if it succeeded returns true otherwise false
